thorough.translate: тщательный, полный, подробный, глубокий, основательный, доскональный, совершенный
examples: The police investigation was very thorough.
The doctor gave him a thorough check-up.
His knowledge of French literature is extensive and thorough.
The investigator will have to be thorough.
Her daughter was a thorough coquette.
a thorough understanding of the rules and regulations
The screening of applicants must be thorough.
example_translate: У него обширные и основательные знания в области французской литературы.
